feed.title: This thread is not about the soft/hard fork technical debate

entry.title: This thread is not about the soft/hard fork technical debate
entry.summary: The question being asked is about forking in the protocol and whether one should only listen to regular Bitcoin Core contributors. It is suggested that this belief stems from a small centralized group of developers who want to maintain their power within the Bitcoin community. The lack of a documented process has led to objections and concerns regarding issues such as this.
